com.github.restdriver.serverdriver
Class RestServerDriver

java.lang.Object
  com.github.restdriver.serverdriver.RestServerDriver

public final class RestServerDriver
extends Object

Provides static methods for performing HTTP requests against a resource.

Author:
mjg

body

public static RequestBody body(String content,
                               String contentType)
Make a RequestBody for PUT or POST.

Parameters:
content - Request body content as String.
contentType - content-type eg text/plain.
Returns:
The new request body instance.

usingProxy

public static RequestProxy usingProxy(String proxyHost,
                                      int proxyPort)
Use a user-specified proxy.

Parameters:
proxyHost - The host.
proxyPort - The port.
Returns:
The new RequestProxy instance.

notUsingProxy

public static NoOpRequestProxy notUsingProxy()
Do not use a proxy. This is the default anyway, but allowed for clarity.

Returns:
The new NoOpRequestProxy instance.

usingSystemProxy

public static AnyRequestModifier usingSystemProxy()
Use the system proxy. These can be set with -Dhttp.proxyHost and -Dhttp.proxyPort. This does not respect environment variables like HTTP_PROXY & friends.

Returns:
The RequestProxy instance.

withTimeout

public static AnyRequestModifier withTimeout(int timeout,
                                             TimeUnit timeUnit)
Use a single timeout value for both connection and socket timeouts.

Parameters:
timeout - The timeout duration to use.
timeUnit - The unit of the timeout.
Returns:
The RequestTimeout instance.

public static Response options(Object url)
Perform an HTTP OPTIONS on a resource.

Parameters:
url - The URL of a resource. Accepts any Object and calls .toString() on it.
Returns:
A Response encapsulating the server's reply.

public static Response post(Object url,
                            BodyableRequestModifier... modifiers)

Parameters:
url - The URL. Any object may be passed, we will call .toString() on it.
modifiers - The modifiers to be applied to the request.
